text: Magnolia cylindrica, the Huangshan magnolia (named for Mount Huang, where it can be found naturally), is a species of plant in the family Magnoliaceae. It is endemic to China. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==Gallery== File:Magnolia cylindrica bud.jpg|Flower bud File:Magnolia cylindrica flower.jpg|Flower File:Magnolia cylindrica fruit.jpg|Maturing fruit ==References== ==External links== * Magnolia cylindrica images at the Arnold Arboretum of Harvard University Plant Image Database Category:Flora of China cylindrica Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Magnolia cylindrica
